symptoms.name: Rash
symptoms.pattern: Erythema migrans (bull's-eye rash) common in early stages

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.pattern: Common in early and late stages

symptoms.name: Heart problems
symptoms.pattern: Can occur in later stages (Lyme carditis)

lab_values.antibody tests: Positive serologic tests (ELISA, Western blot) for Borrelia burgdorferi antibodies.  Note that these can be negative in early stages.

risk_factors: Exposure to ticks in endemic areas
Outdoor activities in wooded or grassy areas

required: Clinical presentation consistent with Lyme disease
Positive serologic test for Borrelia burgdorferi antibodies (ELISA, Western blot) – though a negative test does not rule out early-stage disease
supportive: History of tick bite in endemic area
